titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the funerall of Mr. Iosiah Reynel Esquire, the 13. of August 1614. in East-Ogwell in Deuon. By Iohn Preston Minister of Gods word in East-Ogwell
titleStmt.author: Preston, John, minister of East Ogwell.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Richard Boulton, and are to be sold at his shop in Chancery-lane,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A funerall sermon.
Identified as STC 20267 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
